channel.title: Brookline Village, Massachusetts Weather
channel.description:
Current weather, forecasts and alerts delivered using RSS.

The weather information for this RSS feed is taken from the National Weather Service (http://weather.noaa.gov/), and powered by HamWeather (http://www.hamweather.com/).

Using the Feeds

  • Request Frequency - The feeds are updated once per hour. More frequent requests may result in your access being limited.
  • Web Site Usage - If you are using the feed on your web site, you are required to maintain a link to rssWeather.com and hamweather.com

item.title: Forecast for Tonight
item.description: Mostly cloudy with a chance of showers with a slight chance of thunderstorms. Lows in the upper 50s. Southwest winds 10 to 15 mph. Becoming northwest 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Chance of rain 50 percent.

item.title: Forecast for Wednesday
item.description: Mostly sunny. Cooler with highs in the upper 60s. North winds 5 to 10 mph. Becoming east in the afternoon.

item.title: Forecast for Wednesday Night
item.description: Partly cloudy. Lows in the mid 50s. Southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.
item.guid: F-KBOS-415 PM EDT TUE MAY 24 2011-WEDNESDAY NIGHT
